attributes.action: Change the starting date of the new childcare scheme.
attributes.additional_details: With the overwelming costs of living, the government should be courageous enough to introduce the new childcare scheme from September 2023 so current families of under 2 can also benefit from the scheme. Why wait until April 2024?
attributes.background: Change the implementation date of the new childcare provisions from April 2024 to September 2023.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634909
